reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater wonderfully soft, comfortable, and flattering, with one mentioning it hides arm and belly fat.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars versatile & cute
items.body: this sweater is so comfortable, soft, thick, and versatile. the length is great and looks fantastic with leggings Read more
items.author: Destiny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stylish
items.body: So soft and beautiful! Afraid to wash it because itâ€™s so perfect I donâ€™t want to mess it up. Iâ€™d wear it everyday if I could ðŸ˜‚ Read more
items.author: Wrightal21

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!!!
items.body: This sweater is so warm and comfortable. Great quality and good value for money. Sleeve length is perfect and it does not fit tightly just enough puff to be comfortable and not have you looking down on yourself. Read more
items.author: Destiny Stanley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost the perfect sweater
items.body: I really wanted to love this sweater. It looked so cute, comfy, and had that slightly oversized vibe I was going for. I shouldâ€™ve checked the reviews more though. When I tried it on, I noticed it hugs around the hips at the bottom but is loose in the middle, which Iâ€™m not a fan of. The material is soft, comfy, and lightweight. The sleeves are a little flowy, the cuffs arenâ€™t too tight, and there was no weird smell. I wouldâ€™ve kept it if it wasnâ€™t so fitted at the bottom, but if you pull it down and then adjust it up a bit, it can give that more relaxed oversized look. Read more
items.author: Dana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cozy!
items.body: So soft! So cozy! Bright orange and I love it! Read more
items.author: Happy Nurse

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, but the fit is weird and as others have said, the photo color is off
items.body: The good: the fabric is very soft and cozy. The Medium, as far as chest, waist, and hips measurements, seems true to size. The meh: I sized up because I have long arms and I assumed I'd need to, but the sleeve length was still not long enough for me. The sleeves taper down from wide bat-wings to form-fitting around the forearm, which isn't super apparent from the product photos but I guess it's how you get the oversized, pooling over the wrist effect. It's fine, but the tapering starts up at my elbow, and if I want the foldover look, i have to cinch up the wrist cuff almost up to the middle of my foream, defeating the effect that the sleeves are over-long. And if I stretch the sleeve cuffs down to my wrists, the tapering effect is fully visible and I'm not a big fan. The color: as others have said, the photo color are off. I got the buffer and it's almost a ballerina pink. Still pretty, but not the color I wanted. The verdict: if it was just the color being off, I'd probably keep it because the sweater is super soft. But the sleeve length is too far off for me and I'll be returning it. Read more
items.author: KRR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall sweater
items.body: Cute, thick, and comfy. Itâ€™s breathable but cozy. It washes just fine right out of the package. I usually wear size large in womenâ€™s but I sized up to have it baggy, and it does. I am not of the bigger bust community, but with sizing up, there was plenty of room with this sweater. I can see myself buying more in the future! Read more
items.author: Evelynne Metzler

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible quality, not even single-use
items.body: I ordered a small in yellow, and after only a couple hours of wearing it, it got briefly caught on the corner of a desk, pulled a thread, then ripped a hole. The quality is terrible. Itâ€™s soft and warm, but it is definitely see-through without a matching undershirt or bra. I will be contacting support for a refund without return. $40 for a sweater that looks and feels nice, but leaves me with a hole before Iâ€™m even home is nowhere near worth the price. Unless you are the human equivalent of furniture wrapped in plastic and never move, do not buy this, the quality will fail you quickly. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-light Pink, 2-off Shoulder Blue, 2-off Shoulder Brown, 3-turtleneck Apricot, 2-off Shoulde Pink, 1-apricot, 2-off Shoulde Beige, 1-khaki, 2-off Shoulde Coffee, 3-turtleneck Green, 1-brick Red, 1-purple, 3-turtleneck White, 1-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
